thread.section_title: Avas Flowers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Avas Flowers | avasflowers.com | 4 of 317
thread.title: JosephRiden

author: JosephRiden
title: JosephRiden
text:
Hi, Avas People,
Wow, you guys delivered a gorgeous and impressive bouquet with lots of the right colors. My long-time friend felt blow away by this gesture on her birthday. Thank you for sustaining high standards for both service and craft. Giving a woman flowers has to be one of the very best ways for a man to express how special a friendship is to him.
Take Care,
Joseph
